Vulnerability.name: APSB14-23: 安全更新: ColdFusion可用的修补程序 (CVE-2014-0570)
Vulnerability.Description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Adobe ColdFusion 9.0 before Update 13, 9.0.1 before Update 12, 9.0.2 before Update 7, 10 before Update 14, and 11 before Update 2 allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of unspecified victims via unknown vectors.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/coldfusion/apsb14-23.html

Vulnerability.name: APSB14-23: 安全更新: ColdFusion可用的修补程序 (CVE-2014-0571)
Vulnerability.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Adobe ColdFusion 9.0 before Update 13, 9.0.1 before Update 12, 9.0.2 before Update 7, 10 before Update 14, and 11 before Update 2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/coldfusion/apsb14-23.html

Vulnerability.name: APSB14-23: 安全更新: ColdFusion可用的修补程序 (CVE-2014-0572)
Vulnerability.Description: Adobe ColdFusion 9.0 before Update 13, 9.0.1 before Update 12, 9.0.2 before Update 7, 10 before Update 14, and 11 before Update 2 allows local users to bypass intended IP-based access restrictions via unspecified vectors.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/coldfusion/apsb14-23.html

Vulnerability.name: APSB14-29: 安全更新: ColdFusion可用的修补程序 (CVE-2014-9166)
Vulnerability.Description: Adobe ColdFusion 10 before Update 15 and 11 before Update 3 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (resource consumption) via unspecified vectors.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： http://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/coldfusion/apsb14-29.html

Vulnerability.name: APSB15-07: 安全更新: ColdFusion可用的修补程序 (CVE-2015-0345)
Vulnerability.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Adobe ColdFusion 10 before Update 16 and 11 before Update 5 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/coldfusion/apsb15-07.html

Vulnerability.name: APSB16-16: 安全更新: ColdFusion可用的修补程序 (CVE-2016-1113)
Vulnerability.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Adobe ColdFusion 10 before Update 19, 11 before Update 8, and 2016 before Update 1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/coldfusion/apsb16-16.html

Vulnerability.name: APSB16-16: 安全更新: ColdFusion可用的修补程序 (CVE-2016-1114)
Vulnerability.Description: Adobe ColdFusion 10 before Update 19, 11 before Update 8, and 2016 before Update 1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a crafted serialized Java object, related to the Apache Commons Collections library.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/coldfusion/apsb16-16.html

Vulnerability.name: APSB16-16: 安全更新: ColdFusion可用的修补程序 (CVE-2016-1115)
Vulnerability.Description: Adobe ColdFusion 10 before Update 19, 11 before Update 8, and 2016 before Update 1 mishandles wildcards in name fields of X.509 certificates, which might allow man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof servers via a crafted certificate.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/coldfusion/apsb16-16.html

Vulnerability.name: APSB16-22: 安全更新: ColdFusion可用的修补程序 (CVE-2016-4159)
Vulnerability.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Adobe ColdFusion 10 before Update 20, 11 before Update 9, and 2016 before Update 2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/coldfusion/apsb16-22.html

Vulnerability.name: APSB16-30: 安全更新: ColdFusion可用的修补程序 (CVE-2016-4264)
Vulnerability.Description: The Office Open XML (OOXML) feature in Adobe ColdFusion 10 before Update 21 and 11 before Update 10 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files or send TCP requests to intranet servers via a crafted OOXML spreadsheet containing an external entity declaration in conjunction with an entity reference, related to an XML External Entity (XXE) issue.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复此安全问题，补丁获取链接： https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/coldfusion/apsb16-30.html

Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接: https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/coldfusion/apsb18-33.html

Vulnerability.name: 过时的Adobe ColdFusion版本
Vulnerability.Description: This release has passed its End of Life. There may be unpatched security vulnerabilities. Please check with Adobe's Products and techincal support periods for supported versions.
Vulnerability.Solutions: 目前厂商还没有提供此漏洞的相关补丁或者升级程序，建议使用此软件的用户随时关注厂商的主页以获取最新版本： https://www.alice-dsl.de/
